user_input: Please create hourly hydrogen demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios. Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Convert to tst format.
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the PLEXOS model specifications.

tasks.description: Create hourly hydrogen demand profiles for TYNDP 2026 scenarios using the 'NT', 'NT_HE', and 'NT_LE' scenarios for the years 2030, 2035, 2040, and 2050.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Please create hourly hydrogen demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios. Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Convert to tst format.', select the most appropriate entity for demand profile processing.

tasks.description: Split the nodes in the model as specified in the scenario.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Please create hourly hydrogen demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios. Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Convert to tst format.', select the relevant nodes to split.

tasks.description: Convert the processed hourly demand profiles into the standard TST format for the TYNDP study team.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Please create hourly hydrogen demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios. Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Convert to tst format.', select the appropriate TST file format conversion parameters.
